definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: There is ice hockey in Nanjing?
Hockey rinks are a lot warmer than you think.
sentences.chinese: 冰球場比你想象的要溫暖的多。
